top_comments_top.body: They work pretty well. I just checked out the Amazon reviews. For a nice but cheap set it's only $60 and it's got fantastic reviews. It's recommended as Amazon's choice as well when you only search "gaming keyboard"

Red dragon I have used, it was alright! Id say its average, but I have a razer mini and just a Logitech mouse. I like them very much, but I have also heard ducky keyboards are great. Hopefully you have a great trip man.
I have a razer huntsman keyboard and steelseries rival 310. And I am happy with them. Cost is quite high and the keyboard is really sensitive. Don’t know if this helps. Good luck
